problem.p: Using the slope and intercept that you found above, draw the line tangent to the curve in the first quadrant at \(x=1\). Does your answer make sense?

p.em: Orient your line by dragging its handles; shift your tangent line by dragging the line's center. You may need to try this a few times to get the appropriate angle.

problem.p: Answer: A line of slope \(\frac{1}{5}\) touching the point \((1,1)\)
